properties.value: NIST IR 8413, FIPS 203/204/205, Streamlined NTRU Prime

properties.name: cbom:pqc:recommendation:1
properties.value: Plan PQC migration within 12-24 months for quantum-vulnerable components

properties.value: Consider hybrid cipher suites (X25519Kyber768) for gradual transition

properties.name: cbom:pqc:recommendation:3
properties.value: Test NIST-finalized PQC algorithms in non-production environments
